撤下.definition: to withdraw; to remove (from a place); to remove from office

撤僑.definition: to evacuate (e.g. foreign civilians from a war zone)

撤出.definition: to withdraw; to leave; to retreat; to pull out

撤回.definition: to recall; to revoke; to retract

撤掉.definition: to cut; to throw out; to depose (from office); to tear off

撤換.definition: to dismiss and replace (sb); to replace (sb or sth)

撤消.definition: variant of 撤銷|撤销[che4 xiao1]

撤稿.definition: to withdraw a submission; to retract a submission (to a newspaper, magazine, journal etc)

撤職.definition: to eliminate; to sack; to remove from office

撤走.definition: to retire; to remove; to withdraw; to evacuate

撤銷.definition: to repeal; to revoke; (computing) to undo
